original_title: Sri Lankan Rupee ends firmer against US Dollar
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee today (June 01) further appreciated against the US Dollar, the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) reported.
Accordingly, the buying rate was declared at Rs. 283.87, while the selling rate was reported at Rs. 297.23.
Meanwhile, the Middle Rate of the USD/LKR SPOT exchange rate stood at Rs. 292.45.
